document_data.name: ''Belt of priestly might and warding''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''belt of priestly might and warding''''' was a magical defensive item, created by servants of [[deities]] in [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Powers: These belts granted the same boons as a ''[[belt of priestly might]]'' as well as the ability to create a ''[[magic circle against evil]]'' or ''[[Magic circle against good|against good]]'' once per day that lasted for 80 minutes.
document_data.History: Like the ''belt of priestly might'', this item was first created after the [[Time of Troubles]].
document_data.Creation: To create a ''belt of priestly might and warding'', the spells ''[[barkskin]]'', ''[[bull's strength]]'', and ''magic circle against good''/''evil'' were cast.
